summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 GMC SIERRA 1500. WHILE DRIVING 5 MPH, THE STEERING WHEEL BECAME EXTREMELY DIFFICULT TO TURN. THE ENGINE ALSO LOST POWER WITHOUT WARNING AND THE REARVIEW CAMERA DISPLAY FAILED TO FUNCTION. THE FAILURE RECURRED TWO OTHER TIMES. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO PHIL MOORE BUICK GMC (5728 I-55 NORTH, JACKSON, MS 39211), BUT THE FAILURE COULD NOT BE REPLICATED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 36,000.
